name: Journey of Unicorn's hat
description:
The most distinguished game ever about the unicorn. Without rainbow. Only hardcore.
Fly as a bird! Oh... I mean, fly as a hat, play as a hat, be a hat! 

Help blown away hat in this amazing and challenging journey. Go through the clouds, the wind and the storm to make the unicorn happy again!

How to play:
- Use the map to explore the level
- Press on your hat and pull your finger back
- Launch!
- Fly to the unicorn
- Tap to jump
- Hope that the wind is fair
- Don't miss!
- Oops... restart the level

No one will make it with one attempt, but you can try.
